physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Short, centrally obese, mildly disheveled white man with a right arm hook prosthesis. Notable coarse, bilateral resting hand tremor and right foot tremor that decreased with intention. Mildly anxious during the interview. Mildly pressured speech when discussing sensitive topics.

Mood was 'depressed' with mildly euphoric affect at times. Circumstantial and tangential speech when anxious with mild disorganization and loosening of associations. Denied active or passive suicidal ideation, homicidal ideation, paranoid ideation, auditory or visual hallucinations. Notable lack of insight into illness.
